name: Darkness in the abyss
description: "Darkness in the abyss" is a simple platform game in which the main purpose is to perform tasks in order to complete the castle construction, and to take care of player character by gathering food suplies and raw materials necessary to build the castle. The quests in the game  are not only related to the story, there ar side missions and random missions. The time for player to end the game is limited, it can be extended by performing special missions that will appear when the designated time to end game will come to an end. In the game there ar procedural generated dungeons full of traps and monsters that can apply poison or burn efect, but not only monsters and traps can kill player. Players must remember to protect their character from hunger and cold, especialy when weather is bad. Try to end this game in time as short as posible to get better score.
